message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115.  I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the product, $115 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $105?  It's a fair price for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $110. I'm confident this product will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $108.  Let's find a middle ground and close this deal.
